name: Tower of Babel (itch) (Rabbs)
description:
Firstly, Thank you for taking the time to playtest my game! I really appreciate it and it will help me improve upon the game. 


The game, "Tower of Babel" (name in the works), is about building your tower as tall as possible. 


NOTE : This is a pc build, but the game is intended for mobile, as such, please adjust your views of it accordingly. (Distributing a pc build is much easier than distributing a mobile build).


CONTROLS : 
Press SPACE to place your block. Thats it!  




Once you've played for 5-10 minutes (or as long as you like!) please take the time to fill out a quick questionaire :
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSddIieq1ULLJQ_suINLY3An16BQp5mv67JmKcvSLfmIhWE2yA/viewform?usp=sf_link

Thank you!
